Docs.summary: The handler calls methods on the events which give the application control at certain points where processing is occurring. If it is not provided a default instance is supplied which does nothing when the methods are called.

Docs.summary: Searches the 'Authorization' header for a 'Bearer' token. If the 'Bearer' token is found, it is validated using set in the options.
